original_text: It will be very bad for that land beyond the rivers of Cush. Their ships seem to have wings and fly everywhere!
korean_text: 슬프다 구스의 강 건너편 날개 치는 소리 나는 땅이여

sentences.original_text: for that land beyond the rivers of Cush
sentences.korean_translation: 구스의 강들 너머 그 땅을 위하여

sentences.original_text: Their ships seem to have wings
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 배들은 날개를 가진 것처럼 보인다
